content.json:
Changes during Debug Mode

Identifies changes for runtime data during a debugging activity.

Executions of Sensitive Actions

Identifies a direct execution of:

  • Sensitive transaction code
  • Sensitive ABAP program
  • Sensitive function module

content.title: Execution of a Sensitive ABAP Program
Execution of a Sensitive Transaction Code
Dialog Execution of Sensitive Function Module
RFC Execution of a Sensitive Function Module
Sensitive Actions by Time
Sensitive Actions Anomalies

content.json:
Deactivation of Logs

Identifies deactivation of logs.

content.title: Deactivation of Security Audit Log

content.query:
Syslog 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where ProcessName startswith "HDB"
| where SyslogMessage contains "AUDIT CONFIGURATION" and 
    SyslogMessage contains 'global_auditing_state' and 
    SyslogMessage contains 'False'
| summarize Deactivations = count() by Time = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: HANA DB - Deactivation of Audit Trail

content.json:
Changes in Configuration

Identifies changes in configuration in system, client, transactions etc.

content.query:
// Audit Log Classes - Audit Log Configuration Events
let AuditClasses = dynamic(['AUE','AUF','AUI','AUJ','FU0','E05']); // Relevant messages
SAPAuditLog 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where MessageID in (AuditClasses)
| project 
// Details
TimeGenerated, SystemID, User, MessageText,
AccountCustomEntity = Email, IPCustomEntity = TerminalIPv6, HostCustomEntity = Host
| summarize Changes = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: Security Audit Log Configuration Change

content.query:
// Audit Log Classes - Audit Log Configuration Events
let AuditClasses = dynamic(['AUE','AUF','AUI','AUJ','FU0','E05']); // Relevant messages
SAPAuditLog 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where MessageID in (AuditClasses)
| project 
// Details
TimeGenerated, SystemID, User, MessageText,
AccountCustomEntity = Email, IPCustomEntity = TerminalIPv6, HostCustomEntity = Host
| summarize Changes = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| make-series Changes=avg(Changes) on TimeGenerated from ago(7d) to ago(0d) step 1h 
| extend (Anomalies, Score, Baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Changes, 1.5, -1, 'linefit')
| project-away Score
content.title: Security Audit Log Configuration Change Anomalies
System Configuration Change

content.query:
// Audit Log Classes - Client Change Configuration
let AuditClasses = dynamic(['EU2']); // Relevent message
SAPAuditLog 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where MessageID in (AuditClasses)
| project-rename ClientIDTemp = ClientID 
| project-rename ClientID= Variable1 
| parse Variable2 with Currency "|" ClientRole "|" RecordingChanges "|" CrossClientObjectChanges "|" ClientCopyProtectionLevel "|" ProtectionSAPUpgrade "|" CATTeCATT "|"  LockedforCopy // Parse every object before the | char 
| project TimeGenerated, SystemID, User, ClientID, 
Currency,ClientRole,RecordingChanges,CrossClientObjectChanges,ClientCopyProtectionLevel,CATTeCATT,LockedforCopy,ProtectionSAPUpgrade,
AccountCustomEntity = Email, IPCustomEntity = TerminalIPv6, HostCustomEntity = Host
content.title: Client Configuration Change

content.query:
// Audit Log Classes - Transaction UnLock Events
// AUP - Transaction Locked
let AuditClasses = dynamic(['AUQ']); // AUQ - Transaction Unlocked
SAPAuditLog 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where MessageID in (AuditClasses)
| project-rename TransactionCodeTemp = TransactionCode 
| project-rename TransactionCode= Variable1
| parse TransactionCode with "( TR ) " _TCODE " - " ClientTR // Parse to _TCODE and ClientTR
// Specific Client Action (SM01_CUS) / Cross Client (SM01_DEV)
| extend TransactionCode = iif(_TCODE != "",_TCODE, TransactionCode) // Check if _TCODE is not empty
| extend ClientTR = iif(ClientTR != "",ClientTR, "CrossClient") // Check if ClientTR is not empty
| summarize count() by TransactionCode
content.title: Transactions Unlocked
Dynamic ABAP Programs
Debugging Activities (Press to Investigate)
Data Changes By User

content.query:
SAPAuditLog 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where User=='{User}'
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, SystemID, ClientID, MessageID ,MessageClass, MessageText
| take 20
content.title: Detailed Activity of Suspicious User: {User}

content.json:
Multiple Logons By

  • IP - Identifies logon of several users from same IP within scheduled time interval.
  • User - Identifies logon of the same user from several terminals within scheduled time interval.

content.title: Multiple Logons by User (Press to Investigate)
Multiple Logons by IP (Press to Investigate)

content.query:
SAPAuditLog 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where User=='{UserU}'
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, SystemID, ClientID, MessageID ,MessageClass, MessageText
| take 20
content.title: {UserU} Detailed Activity

content.query:
SAPAuditLog 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeSelect}
| where (SystemID in ({Systems}) or  '*' in ({Systems}))
| where User=='{UserIP}'
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, SystemID, ClientID, MessageID ,MessageClass, MessageText
| take 20
content.title: {UserIP} Detailed Activity
